body:
Hello Zack.


I assume the position you advertised in May (see below) is already  
filled.
I just have been 'made redundant' as they say in my new job and l am  
thinking
about getting deeper into daylight again.


Please let me know if you're still looking for candidates.


Regards,
Thomas
